remarks: Value of the constant functor at an object.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2017.)
statement:
diagval.l $e |- L = ( C DiagFunc D ) $.
diagval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
diagval.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
diag11.a $e |- A = ( Base ` C ) $.
diag11.c $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
diag11.k $e |- K = ( ( 1st ` L ) ` X ) $.
diag11.b $e |- B = ( Base ` D ) $.
diag11.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
diag11 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( 1st ` K ) ` Y ) = X ) $.
